title: Revenue of water utilities - United States 2000 to 2015
summary: Overall Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2005 to 2010.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2005 and 2010.
Maximum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, about 43.5 was reported at Year 2010
Minimum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 35.1 was reached at Year 2005
